mapper.insert: insert into ad_seat_info (id, name, province, city, region, street, media_id, ad_seat_type, ad_code, location, ad_size, pv, private_car_pv, bus_pv, lon, lat, create_time, update_time ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{province,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{city,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{region,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{street,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mediaId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{adSeatType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{adCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adSize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pv,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{privateCarPv,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{busPv,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lon,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{lat,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

mapper.update:
update ad_seat_info
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
province = #{province,jdbcType=INTEGER},
city = #{city,jdbcType=INTEGER},
region = #{region,jdbcType=INTEGER},
street = #{street,jdbcType=INTEGER},
media_id = #{mediaId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ad_seat_type = #{adSeatType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ad_code = #{adCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
location = #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ad_size = #{adSize,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pv = #{pv,jdbcType=INTEGER},
private_car_pv = #{privateCarPv,jdbcType=INTEGER},
bus_pv = #{busPv,jdbcType=INTEGER},
lon = #{lon,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
lat = #{lat,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update ad_seat_info set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province = #{province,jdbcType=INTEGER}, city = #{city,jdbcType=INTEGER}, region = #{region,jdbcType=INTEGER}, street = #{street,jdbcType=INTEGER}, media_id = #{mediaId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ad_seat_type = #{adSeatType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ad_code = #{adCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, location = #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ad_size = #{adSize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pv = #{pv,jdbcType=INTEGER}, private_car_pv = #{privateCarPv,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bus_pv = #{busPv,jdbcType=INTEGER}, lon = #{lon,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, lat = #{lat,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select a.name, a.province, a.city, a.region, a.street, b.media_name, a.ad_code, a.location, a.ad_size, a.pv, c.name as typename, a.private_car_pv, a.bus_pv, a.lon, a.lat from ad_seat_info as a left join ad_media as b on a.media_id=b.id left join ad_seat_type as c on a.ad_seat_type=c.id where a.id=#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
